review: Pros- Great entertainment if you have amazon prime. A ton of free shows and movies that are definitely worth watching and rewatching. HBO shows alone make the stick worth the price to me. They don't have all the newest shows, like Game of Thrones for example, but getting to watch Oz, Carnivale, Band of Brothers, and many more, makes it worth buying. Plenty more shows and movies as well, just using HBO as an example. Pretty nice selection of free music too. Entertainment it's well worth it.Con- Not so great at mirroring my cell phone. This is why originally bought it, and figured the free entertainment would be a bonus. It turned out not to work to well for it's intended purpose, but it won me over with all the stuff you do get if you have Amazon Prime. I'm not sure how it rates without Prime as I intend to keep it.I'm very happy as a whole with this product. I'm going to keep it upstairs in my room, where I watch most of my TV. I'll look into buying another casting device. But, if you have Amazon Prime this thing is well worth the 39 dollars or so for entertainment. No regrets.
author: Jason Knott

review: I really don't get into leaving reviews because I know most folks that leave them have agendas...and I don't... I just have to say that this thing has been a huge disappointment. The content offering is great and the fact that it has a dedicated remote is great. But this thing sports some major lag. It's probably got a lot to do with my laziness, but I like to crawl in bed and watch a movie off of plex without having to get up and reboot equipment every time I go to use it... I could go back to 2005 and pop in a dvd before I get in bed but I don't really want to. I have many other appliances running plex all over my house and none of them ever have an issue but not this... Noooooo... She'll lag if it kills her. I push a button on the remote and it just sits there... For like a minute... Then it goes ape dung running all of the other commands I pushed while waiting... Then it just gets overwhelmed and stops. Well, enough about me, hope yours works out better.
